attributes.action: stop political correctness as it has been taken to far and is beyond a joke.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition has been started as there has been to many changes to the english language and the way of life just to satisfy certain religions and  immigrants. i am hopeing to get 10.000 people to sign this petition and help stop this madness and make britain great once again like it used to be before political correctness went crazy.
